content:
CompositeActivity Class

Definition

Derivative of Activity that is the base class for all activities that contain other activities. A CompositeActivity is responsible for managing the execution of its child activities.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityMarkupSerializer), typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer))]
[System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityTypeDescriptorProvider))]
[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityCodeGenerator(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityCodeGenerator))]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator))]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ContentProperty("Activities")]
public class CompositeActivity : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

A CompositeActivity manages the execution of its child activities using ActivityExecutionContext class methods and events defined on the Activity class. For example, a child activity is scheduled for execution using the ExecuteActivity of ActivityExecutionContext. A CompositeActivity activity can be notified when a child activity completes its execution by subscribing to the Closed event defined on Activity.

The workflow runtime enforces certain constraints on CompositeActivity execution, the most fundamental of which is that a CompositeActivity activity cannot move to the Closed state if any child activities are still in a Executing, Canceling, Compensating, or Faulting, state.

Constructors

CompositeActivity()

Initializes a new instance of the CompositeActivity class.

public CompositeActivity ();

CompositeActivity(IEnumerable<Activity>)

Initializes a new instance of the CompositeActivity class from an Object which implements the IEnumerable interface with type Activity.

public CompositeActivity (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> children);
children
IEnumerable<Activity>

The Object implementing the IEnumerable interface with type Activity.

CompositeActivity(String)

Initializes a new instance of the CompositeActivity class, along with the name for that activity.

public CompositeActivity (string name);
name
String

The name for the instance.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

name is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Properties

Activities

Gets the object representing the collection, ActivityCollection, of all child activities.

public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection Activities { get; }
Value
ActivityCollection

ActivityCollection of all child activities.

Remarks

Represents the collection of child activities managed by the composite activity. This collection can be updated.

CanModifyActivities

Gets or sets a value which controls whether the individual activities within stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* can be modified.

protected bool CanModifyActivities { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the individual activities within stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* can be modified; otherwise false.

EnabledActivities

Gets the read-only collection that represents the subset of stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* that are enabled.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> EnabledActivities { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<Activity>

The read-only collection that represents the subset of stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* that are enabled.

Methods

ApplyWorkflowChanges(WorkflowChanges)

Applies the WorkflowChanges manifest in the parameter to this instance.

protected void ApplyWorkflowChanges (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges workflowChanges);
workflowChanges
WorkflowChanges

The WorkflowChanges to apply.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

workflowChanges is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Dispose(Boolean)

Calls stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose* on this instance, and optionally calls stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose* on all child activities of this instance.

protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

true to release both managed and unmanaged resources used by this instance and all child activities of this instance; false to release only the unmanaged resources of this instance.

Remarks

Throughout an activity's lifetime, several .NET objects may be created or disposed. Every time a workflow instance is unloaded from memory, the .NET objects corresponding to the activities in the workflow tree are disposed (the Dispose method is called on each activity). When the workflow instance is loaded back into memory, a new .NET object is created for each activity with the state from the corresponding unload.

GetDynamicActivities(Activity)

Returns an array that contains all of the currently executing instances of the specified activity.

protected System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity[] GetDynamicActivities (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity activity);
activity
System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity

The specified Activity.

Returns
Activity[]

An array of activity instances that are currently executing.

HandleFault(ActivityExecutionContext,Exception)

Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.

protected override System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus HandleFault (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext executionContext, Exception exception);
executionContext
ActivityExecutionContext

The ActivityExecutionContext for this instance.

exception
Exception

The Exception that caused this fault.

Returns
ActivityExecutionStatus

The ActivityExecutionStatus that results from an attempt to cancel this instance.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

exception is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Initialize(IServiceProvider)

Initializes all appropriate child activities of this instance and the specified IServiceProvider.

protected override void Initialize (IServiceProvider provider);
provider
IServiceProvider

The specified IServiceProvider.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

provider is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Calls when an activity is added.

The specified ActivityExecutionContext.

The specified Activity.

Remarks

Current implementation provides no functionality.

OnActivityExecutionContextLoad(IServiceProvider)

Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the ActivityExecutionContext for this activity is loaded.

protected override void OnActivityExecutionContextLoad (IServiceProvider provider);
provider
IServiceProvider

An Object that implements IServiceProvider and provides services to this instance.

OnActivityExecutionContextUnload(IServiceProvider)

Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the ActivityExecutionContext for this activity is unloaded.

protected override void OnActivityExecutionContextUnload (IServiceProvider provider);
provider
IServiceProvider

An Object that implements IServiceProvider and provides services to this instance.

OnListChanged(ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs)

Performs additional processing when the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* property changes.

protected virtual void OnListChanged (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs e);
e
ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs

The ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs broadcast by the event.

OnListChanging(ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs)

Event that occurs before a change being made to the underlying stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*.

protected virtual void OnListChanging (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs e);
e
ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs

EventArgs relating to the event.

OnWorkflowChangesCompleted(ActivityExecutionContext)

Called after changes have been made to the collection stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities* of this instance.

protected virtual void OnWorkflowChangesCompleted (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext rootContext);
rootContext
ActivityExecutionContext

The ActivityExecutionContext associated with this instance.

Remarks

When overridden in a derived class, provides processing for this event.

Uninitialize(IServiceProvider)

Called by the workflow runtime engine when an activity transitions into the ActivityExecutionStatus state from the ActivityExecutionStatus state.

protected override void Uninitialize (IServiceProvider provider);
provider
IServiceProvider

An Object that implements IServiceProvider and provides services to this instance.

Remarks

This method is used for activity cleanup, such as clearing dependency properties and deleting queues.
